package.name: lms400_driver
package.description: This package is used to access the Sick LMS400 laser range-finder. It contains all necessary functionality to communicate with the sensor via rosmessages. Based on the asr_sick_lms_400 library, with improvements for encoder reading and performance.
package.author: Aumann Florian, Krehl Yann, Mei√üner Pascal, Jose A. Jimenez-Berni
